NEW_ACTIVITY_MAP_INSTRUCTIONS: Please enter the latitude and longitude for the place in your photo. Click 'Take me there!' to find this place on the map. If the map takes you to the right place, click 'Submit!'
NEW_HUNT_MAP_INSTRUCTIONS: Please adjust the four corners of the proposed quadrant for your field trip. The geo-coordinates of the center point of your quadrant will be adjusted accordingly as you stretch the corners. By default, the geo-coordinates reflect the GPS location of your computer
